trans-unit.source: When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 当派生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 类的服务遇到无法处理的异常时，它可以调用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> 方法来让工作流运行时引擎引发 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该服务会将工作流实例的 <xref:System.Guid> 以及与此事件关联的 <xref:System.Exception> 传入其 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> 调用中。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时引擎在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> 中包装这些参数并引发 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件。

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件的订户内部，您可以读取 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> 属性和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> 属性以获取与特定的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取此服务未能处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />，表示此服务未能处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取与未经处理的异常关联的工作流实例的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 与未经处理的异常关联的工作流实例的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> 等效于与 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件关联的工作流实例的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>。
